data.title: bd-3uo: Add review_id validation in storage layer to prevent path traversal
data.description: Security fix: ReviewLog::new() now validates review_id, rejecting path separators, '..' sequences, empty strings, and non-alphanumeric/dash characters. Prevents crafted review_ids from escaping .crit/reviews/ directory.

data.reason: Security review: LGTM. The validate_review_id() allowlist approach ([a-zA-Z0-9-]) is the correct defense against path traversal. All callers of ReviewLog::new properly handle the Result. No bypass paths exist - review_events_path is only called post-validation. Defense-in-depth via is_legacy_review_id in migrate.rs. Comprehensive test coverage including traversal, special chars, and null bytes.
